00074     class Relation {
00075     public:
00076       typedef Relation        value_type;
00077       typedef Relation const &reference;
00078       typedef Relation const *pointer;
00079 
00080       typedef Relation      base_type;
00081       typedef utils::Symbol id_type;
00082 
00097       static id_type const &get_id(base_type const &rel) {
00098        return rel.name();
00099       }
00100       
00107       Relation()
00108        :m_timeline(NULL) {}
00115       Relation(Relation const &other)
00116        :m_timeline(other.m_timeline), m_pos(other.m_pos) {}
00118       ~Relation() {}
00119 
00139       bool accept_goals() const;
00140 
00141       void recall(goal_id const &g);
00142       void request(goal_id const &g);
00143       
00157       TICK latency() const;
00169       TICK look_ahead() const;
00170       
00189       IntegerDomain dispatch_window(TICK current) const {
00190        TICK lb = current+latency();
00191        
00192        return IntegerDomain(lb, lb+look_ahead());
00193       }
00194 
00204       bool valid() const;
00217       bool active() const;
00218       
00234       TICK               lastObsDate() const;
00248       Observation const &lastObservation() const; 
00249 
00261       TeleoReactor &client() const {
00262        return *(m_pos->first);
00263       }
00274       utils::Symbol const &name() const;
00287       TeleoReactor &server() const;
00288       
00300       bool operator==(Relation const &other) const {
00301        return m_pos==other.m_pos;
00302       }
00314       bool operator!=(Relation const &other) const {
00315        return !operator==(other);
00316       }
00317 
00324       pointer operator->() const {
00325        return this;
00326       }
00327       reference operator*() const {
00328        return *operator->();
00329       }
00348       Relation &operator++() {
00349        ++m_pos;
00350        return *this;
00351       }
00352 
00353     private:
00364       Relation(details::timeline *tl,
00365               details::client_set::iterator const &pos)
00366        :m_timeline(tl), m_pos(pos) {}
00367 
00368       void unsubscribe() const;
00369 
00370       details::timeline            *m_timeline;
00371       details::client_set::iterator m_pos;
